name: HSP_ADMIT_DIAG
description: The HSP_ADMIT_DIAG table contains information on admission diagnoses. This table is based on patient contact serial number.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the admission diagnosis for the patient.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: Unique Identifier for diagnosis record used to document patient's admission diagnosis.

columns.name: ADMIT_DIAG_TEXT
columns.description: Free text admission diagnosis for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
